jd: From: janhavi singh, TEK INSPIRATIONS janhavi.singh@tekinspirations.com Reply to: janhavi.singh@tekinspirations.com Hi,Hope you are doing great.Please let me know if you find the new below position as wellBusiness System AnalystHybrid - Scottsdale, AZUSC/GC Need LOCAL TO greater phoenix areaNeed LINKEDINClient – choice hotelInterview – video + F2FDescription:Looking for Data Mapping & API experience. Gains a thorough understanding of customer requests via analysis and interviews with Product Owners and subject matter experts to fully manage user stories from inception through acceptance.STRONG Mapping history in creating mapping documents from scratch when Mapping between 4 different systems.Will gather all the technical information needed for hand-off to Production Operations and Resilience.Works independently on larger, moderately complex assignments that directly impact the department.Solid understanding of systems development and input/output modeling.STRONG Understanding of message processing UIs such as (SoapUI, ReadyAPI) for functional API testingAbility to interact with the Operating System, locating and reading files.Understand and articulate story/functionality/project dependencies on both system and dependent teams.
